frontmatter.title: What is Ethereum in general? Is it gaining market share?

nodes.html: You can read it at https://www.ethereum.org/ You can also see Ethereum's ranking at the statistics page https://coinmarketcap.com/

frontmatter.title: What are the recommended mobile wallets for CryptoLights?

nodes.html: With mobile phones, you should use Trust Wallet or Coinbase because they are strongly compatible with CryptoLights and log in with one click.

frontmatter.title: With a desktop or laptop browser, which wallet should I use for CryptoLights?

nodes.html: You should use MetaMask to synchronize best for you when you register or log in with just one click.

frontmatter.title: Where can I Buy ETH in my country to join the community?

nodes.html:
We think this is not a difficult problem. If you know a little about Copy and Paste then you can work on this question. Search with keyword in your native language. There will be many individuals who already know about Cryptocurrency in general and Ethereum in particular, they will guide you by written instruction or video. We believe that in any country in the world there are money exchanges to exchange ETH easily.

We recommend https://localethereum.com/ where you can find individuals who want to exchange ETH for money in your country.

frontmatter.title: How can I exchange ETH into money?

nodes.html: You mostly do the the opposite way from above section, you send your existing ETH to someone else and he will send you the money. Look for reputable trading places in your country.
